title: I can't play.
body: When I clicked the League of Legends app in my Applications folder, it did nothing but bounce on my dock for a few seconds then disappear. I then uninstalled it and tried reinstalling it back. Instead when I went on the website and I clicked on 'DOWNLOAD GAME - Oceania Macintosh' , it took me to a black page and doesn't seem to be loading properly and now i can't reinstall it at all. Please help! OWO

replies.body: Seen this about twenty times in the past month. I don't know what they're doing, Riot, but something is preventing particular people from downloading the game.
